Example.Description: These examples return the closure size of the Character, Text and String objects. The closure size would depend on the length of the evaluated objects.

Syntax.Note: Returns the closure size of a Character.
Returns the closure size of a Text.
Returns the closure size of a String.
Returns the closure size of another String.
Syntax.Hints: The closure size may be different values for the same object on different hardware platforms due to word alignment issues. The values returned from the sizeof function in the examples above are the values returned on a Intel Pentium-based platform.
